prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jackson Family Papers, Mss. Collection 1998.3, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Provenance of this collection is unknown.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Papers consists of three tax receipts to Robert Jackson, Thomas M. Jackson, and Jonathan C. Jackson of Wythe County.

did.unittitle: Tax Receipt. P. Gallagher, Sheriff, Wythe County, Virginia to Robert Jackson, Thomas M. Jackson, and Jonathan C. Jackson. 1870.

scopecontent.p: Receipt for state and county tax. State tax for $10,640 worth in property and 1000 acres of land.

did.unittitle: Tax Receipt. J. C. Allison, Treasurer, Wythe County to Robert Jackson, Thomas M. Jackson, and Jonathan C. Jackson. 1874.

scopecontent.p: Receipt for 1000 acres of land valued at $20,000 and property and income valued at $3,438.

did.unittitle: Tax Receipt. J. Winton Repass, Treasurer, Wythe County, Virginia to Robert Jackson and Thomas M. Jackson. 1888

scopecontent.p: Receipt for state, state school tax, county school tax, district school tax, road tax, and county tax on 985 acres of land valued at $19,705 and $3,950 worth of personal property.
